bibl.title: Telegram from J.F. Siler to Philip Showalter Hench, September 4, 1950

div1.p: Siler informs Hench that Kean has died.

div1.head: Telegram from J.F. Siler to Philip Showalter Hench, September 4, 1950
div1.opener:
CLASS OF SERVICE
------
This is a full-rate
Telegram or Cable-
gram unless its de-
ferred character is in-
dicated by a suitable
symbol above or pre-
ceding the address.
WESTERN
UNION
W. P. MARSHALL, PRESIDENT
1201
__________________________________________________
The filing shown in the date line on telegrams and day letters is STANDARD TIME at point of origin. Time of receipt is STANDARD TIME at point of destination
MA164
file Y F
M.WA245 NL PD=WASHINGTON DC. 4=
1950 SEP 4 PM 8 19
DR PHILLIP S HENCH= MAYO CLINIC ROCHESTER MINN=
div1.p:
GREATLY REGRET TO HAVE TO ADVISE YOU THAT GENERAL KEAN DIED
ABOUT 6 OCLOCK THIS EVENING. FINAL ARRANGEMENTS FOR FUNERAL
SERVICES NOT YET COMPLETED=
div1.closer: J F SILER.. THE COMPANY WILL APPRECIATE SUGGESTIONS FROM ITS PATRONS CONCERNING ITS SERVICE
